DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_EXTERNAL_LINKS_1: El mensaje que has enviado contiene un enlace.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_EXTERNAL_LINKS_2: El mensaje que has actualizado contiene un enlace.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_INVITES_1: The message you have sent contains a guild invite.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_INVITES_2: The message you have updated contains a guild invite.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_REPEATED_TEXT_1: The message you have sent contains repeating text.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_REPEATED_TEXT_2: The message you have updated contains repeating text.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_MASS_MENTIONS_1: The message you have sent contains too many mentions.
DEFAULT_REASONS.ANTI_MASS_MENTIONS_2: The message you have updated contains too many mentions.
